These_DT securities_NNS are_VBP attractive_JJ to_TO Japanese_JJ investors_NNS for_IN three_CD reasons_NNS ._.
First_LS ,_, they_PRP are_VBP safe_JJ ._.
While_IN they_PRP are_VBP n't_RB backed_VBN by_IN the_DT full_JJ faith_NN and_CC credit_NN of_IN the_DT U.S._NNP government_NN ,_, as_IN Treasury_NNP bonds_NNS are_VBP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ widely_RB assumed_VBN that_IN the_DT government_NN would_MD support_VB them_PRP if_IN necessary_JJ ._.

But_CC there_EX is_VBZ a_DT risk_NN ,_, which_WDT the_DT Japanese_NNPS discovered_VBD when_WRB they_PRP first_RB dipped_VBD their_PRP$ toes_NNS into_IN the_DT market_NN nearly_RB five_CD years_NNS ago_RB ._.
Since_IN most_JJS mortgages_NNS can_MD be_VB prepaid_VBN or_CC refinanced_VBN at_IN any_DT time_NN ,_, issuers_NNS of_IN mortgage_NN securities_NNS retain_VBP the_DT right_NN to_TO buy_VB back_RB their_PRP$ bonds_NNS before_IN maturity_NN ._.
That_DT 's_VBZ a_DT headache_NN for_IN long-term_JJ investors_NNS ,_, since_IN it_PRP forces_VBZ them_PRP to_TO reinvest_VB their_PRP$ money_NN --_: usually_RB at_IN lower_JJR rates_NNS than_IN the_DT original_JJ mortgage_NN securities_NNS carried_VBD ._.
``_`` Two_CD or_CC three_CD years_NNS ago_RB ,_, the_DT problem_NN was_VBD that_IN people_NNS did_VBD n't_RB understand_VB the_DT prepayment_NN risk_NN ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ Nomura_NN 's_POS Mr._NNP Kato_NNP ._.
``_`` So_RB they_PRP were_VBD surprised_JJ and_CC very_RB disappointed_JJ by_IN prepayment_NN ._. ''_''
Compounding_VBG the_DT trouble_NN to_TO Japanese_JJ investors_NNS ,_, mortgage_NN securities_NNS pay_VBP interest_NN monthly_RB ,_, since_IN most_JJS mortgages_NNS require_VBP homeowners_NNS to_TO make_VB monthly_JJ payments_NNS ._.
But_CC Japanese_JJ institutional_JJ investors_NNS are_VBP used_VBN to_TO quarterly_JJ or_CC semiannual_JJ payments_NNS on_IN their_PRP$ investments_NNS ,_, so_IN the_DT monthly_JJ cash_NN flow_NN posed_VBD administrative_JJ problems_NNS ._.
As_IN a_DT result_NN ,_, Japanese_JJ investors_NNS steered_VBD clear_RB of_IN the_DT mortgage_NN securities_NNS ._.
But_CC they_PRP did_VBD n't_RB lose_VB touch_NN with_IN the_DT U.S._NNP issuers_NNS ._.

And_CC Japanese_JJ investors_NNS took_VBD up_RP nearly_RB all_DT of_IN two_CD $_$ 200_CD million_CD Real_JJ Estate_NNP Mortgage_NNP Investment_NNP Conduits_NNS ,_, a_DT kind_NN of_IN collateralized_JJ mortgage_NN obligation_NN ,_, that_WDT were_VBD offered_VBN to_TO foreigners_NNS this_DT year_NN ._.
In_IN addition_NN ,_, further_JJ packaging_NN of_IN mortgage-backed_JJ securities_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN Blackstone_VBP 's_POS fund_NN ,_, have_VB reduced_VBN the_DT effects_NNS of_IN prepayment_NN risk_NN and_CC automatically_RB reinvest_VB monthly_JJ payments_NNS so_IN institutions_NNS do_VBP n't_RB have_VB to_TO ._.
Freddie_NNP Mac_NNP for_IN years_NNS has_VBZ offered_VBN a_DT so-called_JJ participation_NN certificate_NN that_WDT guarantees_VBZ it_PRP wo_MD n't_RB be_VB prepaid_VBN for_IN a_DT set_NN number_NN of_IN years_NNS and_CC offers_VBZ semiannual_JJ payments_NNS ._.
As_IN Georgia-Pacific_NNP 's_POS bid_NN for_IN Great_NNP Northern_NNP Nekoosa_NNP has_VBZ shown_VBN ,_, uninvited_JJ takeovers_NNS are_VBP still_RB alive_JJ despite_IN premature_JJ reports_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ demise_NN ._.
Therefore_RB ,_, the_DT debate_NN about_IN poison_NN pills_NNS will_MD continue_VB to_TO rage_VB in_IN the_DT boardrooms_NNS of_IN corporations_NNS and_CC the_DT halls_NNS of_IN academia_NN ._.
Although_IN poison_NN pills_NNS come_VBP in_IN different_JJ colors_NNS and_CC shapes_NNS ,_, they_PRP usually_RB give_VBP current_JJ shareholders_NNS the_DT right_NN to_TO buy_VB more_JJR stock_NN of_IN their_PRP$ corporation_NN at_IN a_DT large_JJ discount_NN if_IN certain_JJ events_NNS occur_VBP --_: typically_RB ,_, if_IN a_DT hostile_JJ bidder_NN acquires_VBZ more_JJR than_IN a_DT specified_JJ percentage_NN of_IN the_DT corporation_NN 's_POS stock_NN ._.
However_RB ,_, these_DT discount_NN purchase_NN rights_NNS may_MD generally_RB be_VB redeemed_VBN at_IN a_DT nominal_JJ cost_NN by_IN the_DT corporation_NN 's_POS directors_NNS if_IN they_PRP approve_VBP of_IN a_DT bidder_NN ._.
Supporters_NNS of_IN poison_NN pills_NNS argue_VBP that_DT their_PRP$ adoption_NN forces_VBZ bidders_NNS to_TO negotiate_VB with_IN a_DT corporation_NN 's_POS directors_NNS ,_, who_WP are_VBP thereby_RB put_VBN in_IN a_DT better_JJR position_NN to_TO pursue_VB the_DT long-term_JJ interests_NNS of_IN the_DT corporation_NN ._.
Recent_JJ studies_NNS by_IN Georgeson_NNP &_CC Co._NNP conclude_VBP that_IN corporations_NNS with_IN poison_NN pills_NNS have_VBP experienced_VBN greater_JJR stock-price_JJ appreciation_NN than_IN corporations_NNS without_IN poison_NN pills_NNS during_IN the_DT past_JJ few_JJ years_NNS ._.
Critics_NNS of_IN poison_NN pills_NNS argue_VBP that_IN they_PRP harm_VBP shareholders_NNS by_IN letting_VBG corporate_JJ management_NN defeat_VB takeover_NN bids_NNS at_IN premium_JJ prices_NNS and_CC by_IN deterring_VBG premium_JJ bids_NNS from_IN ever_RB being_VBG made_VBN to_TO shareholders_NNS ._.

A_DT governing_VBG body_NN of_IN both_CC the_DT Financial_NNP Accounting_NNP Standards_NNP Board_NNP and_CC the_DT Governmental_NNP Accounting_NNP Standards_NNP Board_NNP voted_VBD to_TO give_VB the_DT FASB_NNP jurisdiction_NN over_IN accounting_NN standards_NNS for_IN certain_JJ government-owned_JJ entities_NNS ._.
The_DT Financial_NNP Accounting_NNP Foundation_NNP voted_VBD 12-2_RB that_DT FASB_NNP accounting_NN rules_NNS supercede_VBP GASB_NNP rules_NNS in_IN regard_NN to_TO utilities_NNS ,_, hospitals_NNS ,_, and_CC colleges_NNS and_CC universities_NNS owned_VBN by_IN the_DT government_NN ._.
GASB_NNP rules_NNS still_RB apply_VBP for_IN other_JJ government_NN units_NNS ._.
After_IN the_DT GASB_NNP was_VBD founded_VBN in_IN 1984_CD ,_, 11_CD years_NNS after_IN the_DT FASB_NNP ,_, the_DT government-owned_JJ entities_NNS were_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO follow_VB FASB_NNP rules_NNS unless_IN the_DT GASB_NNP superceded_VBD them_PRP ._.

The_DT foundation_NN vote_NN is_VBZ effective_JJ for_IN the_DT affected_JJ government_NN entities_NNS with_IN fiscal_JJ years_NNS that_WDT begin_VBP starting_VBG next_JJ Jan._NNP 1_CD and_CC makes_VBZ the_DT financial_JJ results_NNS of_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS ,_, colleges_NNS and_CC schools_NNS easier_JJR to_TO compare_VB with_IN for-profit_JJ businesses_NNS ._.

To_TO me_PRP ,_, this_DT calls_VBZ into_IN question_NN the_DT validity_NN of_IN the_DT Rowland-Molina_NNP theory_NN and_CC hence_RB the_DT whole_JJ chlorofluorocarbons_NNS replacement_NN effort_NN ._.

Due_JJ to_TO the_DT Treasury_NNP 's_POS need_NN to_TO raise_VB funds_NNS quickly_RB before_IN the_DT current_JJ authority_NN to_TO issue_VB debt_NN expires_VBZ at_IN midnight_NN tonight_NN ,_, yesterday_NN 's_POS auction_NN was_VBD structured_VBN differently_RB from_IN previous_JJ sales_NNS ._.

And_CC because_IN of_IN the_DT early_JJ settlement_NN ,_, the_DT three-month_JJ bills_NNS actually_RB have_VBP a_DT 93-day_JJ maturity_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT six-month_JJ bills_NNS have_VBP an_DT 184-day_JJ maturity_NN ._.

Here_RB are_VBP details_NNS of_IN yesterday_NN 's_POS three-month_JJ and_CC six-month_JJ bill_NN auction_NN :_:
Rates_NNS are_VBP determined_VBN by_IN the_DT difference_NN between_IN the_DT purchase_NN price_NN and_CC face_NN value_NN ._.
Thus_RB ,_, higher_JJR bidding_NN narrows_VBZ the_DT investor_NN 's_POS return_NN while_IN lower_JJR bidding_NN widens_VBZ it_PRP ._.
The_DT percentage_NN rates_NNS are_VBP calculated_VBN on_IN a_DT 360-day_JJ year_NN ,_, while_IN the_DT coupon_NN equivalent_JJ yield_NN is_VBZ based_VBN on_IN a_DT 365-day_JJ year_NN ._.

``_`` And_CC where_WRB we_PRP are_VBP is_VBZ bad_JJ ._. ''_''
Despite_IN valiant_JJ efforts_NNS by_IN Finance_NNP Minister_NNP Mailson_NNP Ferreira_NNP da_NNP Nobrega_NNP ,_, inflation_NN came_VBD to_TO 36_CD %_NN in_IN September_NNP alone_RB and_CC is_VBZ expected_VBN to_TO top_VB 1,000_CD %_NN for_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
That_DT might_MD have_VB been_VBN considered_VBN hyperinflation_NN not_RB long_RB ago_RB ,_, but_CC Argentina_NNP endured_VBD price_NN increases_NNS of_IN almost_RB 200_CD %_NN in_IN July_NNP before_IN bringing_VBG the_DT rate_NN down_RP sharply_RB in_IN August_NNP and_CC September_NNP ._.

For_IN instance_NN ,_, juries_NNS would_MD have_VB to_TO consider_VB specific_JJ ``_`` aggravating_JJ ''_'' and_CC ``_`` mitigating_JJ ''_'' factors_NNS before_IN deciding_VBG whether_IN to_TO condemn_VB someone_NN to_TO death_NN ._.

Revco_NNP D.S._NNP Inc._NNP ,_, the_DT drugstore_NN chain_NN that_WDT filed_VBD for_IN bankruptcy-court_NN protection_NN last_JJ year_NN ,_, received_VBD a_DT $_$ 925_CD million_CD offer_NN from_IN a_DT group_NN led_VBD by_IN Texas_NNP billionaire_NN Robert_NNP Bass_NNP ._.

``_`` Demand_NN from_IN Japan_NNP is_VBZ expected_VBN to_TO continue_VB strong_JJ ,_, but_CC not_RB from_IN other_JJ areas_NNS of_IN the_DT world_NN into_IN the_DT first_JJ quarter_NN of_IN next_JJ year_NN ,_, ''_'' he_PRP said_VBD ._.

However_RB ,_, traders_NNS disregarded_VBD a_DT potential_JJ production_NN disruption_NN in_IN Chile_NNP and_CC a_DT continued_VBN drop_NN in_IN inventories_NNS ._.

In_IN other_JJ commodity_NN markets_NNS yesterday_NN :_:

The_DT prices_NNS of_IN most_JJS corn_NN ,_, soybean_NN and_CC wheat_NN futures_NNS contracts_NNS dropped_VBD slightly_RB as_IN farmers_NNS in_IN the_DT Midwest_NNP continued_VBN to_TO rebuild_VB stockpiles_NNS that_WDT were_VBD depleted_VBN by_IN the_DT 1988_CD drought_NN ._.

COFFEE_NN :_:

According_VBG to_TO one_CD analyst_NN ,_, prices_NNS opened_VBD higher_RBR because_IN of_IN reports_NNS over_IN the_DT weekend_NN that_IN Brazil_NNP and_CC Colombia_NNP ,_, at_IN the_DT Pan-American_JJ summit_NN meeting_NN in_IN Costa_NNP Rica_NNP ,_, had_VBD agreed_VBN to_TO a_DT reduction_NN in_IN their_PRP$ coffee_NN export_NN quotas_NNS for_IN the_DT sake_NN of_IN creating_VBG a_DT new_JJ agreement_NN ._.

''_''
